# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="57e78-102">Kreiranje potpisa e-pošte u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="57e78-103">pođi do</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="57e78-104">**Postavke** > **Prikaz svih postavki** > programa Outlook**i odgovaranje**na njih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="57e78-105">U okviru **potpis za e-poštu**otkucajte svoj potpis i koristite dostupne opcije oblikovanja da biste promenili njen izgled.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57e78-106">*Napomena:* Možete da imate samo jedan potpis po nalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57e78-107">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte odeljak [Kreiranje i dodavanje potpisa e-pošte u programu Outlook na vebu](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e78-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
